attributes.action: Stop Liverpool Football Club and it's supporters from campaigning for things.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and many others are fed up every time we turn on the radio or television or open our newspapers to be met with another story of LFC or it's fans campaigning for something else. Please help stop this nonsense.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
